'''2.3.425''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on September 22, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Ongoing improved error messaging to help users solve problems they running into.
* Improved linking to Bedrock Marketplace items.

== Fixes ==
* Bug fixes to issue with paused Bedrock installations being stuck.
* Fix to Bedrock Preview installation flow bug.
* {{bug|MCL-21565}} - When I try to install a snapshot or 1.19 it comes up with the error: Unable to decompress file. I have no idea of what to do.
* {{bug|MCL-21978}} - Progress bar in minecraft launcher extends beyond gui.
